raw: Saudi Arabia delays May crude prices until after OPEC+ meeting: Saudi source .

raw: DUBAI ( Reuters ) - Saudi Aramco ( 2222.SE ) will delay the release of its crude official selling prices ( OSP ) for May until April 10 to wait for the outcome of a meeting between OPEC and its allies regarding possible output cuts , a senior Saudi source familiar with the matter said on Sunday .
